title: Target Anniversary Line: What to Buy Before It Sells Out
text:
13 items in this article Photo: courtesy of the retailer

Welcome to a special edition of Don’t Dillydally in honor of the Saturday, September 14, release of Target’s 20th Anniversary Design for All Collection. First off, perusing the wares was like taking a trip to my early 20s — when, as a young editor at Paper magazine, my colleagues would take “orders” from us before heading to the press previews, go wild, and return with bags and bags of cardigans, beach towels, and sweater dresses that they doled out to us like Santa Claus. I’ve lost track of a lot of my loot (where, oh where, did my striped Jason Wu for Target dress go?), but I still wear my Missoni for Target cardigan (it’s the one Cate Blanchett’s character wears throughout Blue Jasmine!) on a biweekly basis. The goods go on sale this Saturday, and we imagine that pretty much the whole shebang will sell out within minutes (at least the good stuff), so we’ve rounded up the things we’re particularly excited about, and the pages you may want to bookmark.

John Derian for Target Melamine Wastebasket Animal Print $20 at Target Buy

John Derian for Target Melamine Serving Tray with Handles Floral Print $20 at Target Buy

Marimekko for Target 4pk 20"x20" Cotton Napkin Set White/Black $10 at Target Buy

Proenza Schouler for Target Women's Long Sleeve Bomber Jacket $30 at Target Buy

Hunter for Target Large Tote Bag, Olive $35 at Target Buy

Missoni for Target Women's Colore Zig Zag Long Sleeve V-Neck Button-Front Cardigan $55 at Target Buy

Missoni for Target Toddler Girls' Colore Zig Zag Sleeveless Crewneck Sweater Dress $30 at Target Buy

Jason Wu for Target Women's Striped Sleeveless Collared Pleated Shift Mini Dress $40 at Target Buy

Thakoon for Target Shibori Print Long Sleeve V-Neck Cardigan $35 at Target Buy

Lilly Pulitzer for Target Plus Size Nosey Posie Sleeveless Round Neck Shift Mini Dress $38 at Target Buy

3.1 Phillip Lim for Target Leopard Print Drawstring Carryall Bag $40 at Target Buy

Zac Posen for Target Floral Print Sleeveless Brocade Mini Dress $60 at Target Buy

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.
description: A roundup of our favorite things from Target’s 20th Anniversary Collection (including Missoni, Hunter, Lilly Pulitzer, Proenza Schouler, John Derian, Marimekko, and more) that’ll almost definitely sell out (and quickly).
